summary: Get the Lich King´s sword: Frostmourne!
descriptionHtml:
This is my first Skyrim mod!

-Description-
Hello there Skyrim Nexus this is a tiny mod which adds the Lich King´s sword Frostmourne from World of Warcraft.

-Location-
It is in a chest in Farenger´s room in Dragonsreach, but you will need to steal it.
Or you could forge it under the Daedric menu at any blacksmith.

-Installation-
Just drag the contents of the RAR into your Skyrim´s Data folder.

-Uninstall-
Just delete all files and folders related to the mod.

Hope you guys like the mod!
author: AndreasTutaro
